summary: Adds two adoptable High Elf children to the game.
descriptionHtml:
Like the title suggests, this mod adds two High Elf children that you can give a home to. I haven\'t made up any backstory for them yet, but let\'s just say their parents got murdered by bandits. Oh and they\'re siblings.


Here\'s a texture replacer to remove the shimmer from the female face and body that is present in the Drow mod. http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?pnoce1d0qpy4ww3

Plugins required:
Hearthfire
Drow Race - BETA http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16399
ApachiiSkyHair http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168

Known issues: These children will grow to adult size when sitting or cooking or using an alchemy table, etc. But they shrink down to normal size when they stop using that item.
\"It\'s a vanilla bug for custom race children.\" -GendunDrup

Troubleshooting:
If they wont leave the orphanage after you\'ve adopted them, target them via console, type \"coc *house cell name*\"(example: whiterunbreezehome) and then type \"moveto player\".

One of the mods I\'m using in the screenshots is Slof\'s Posh Clothes. I won\'t link to it though since her website is aimed for adults.

Future plans: Making the kids in this mod slightly taller.

Thanks to:
Zazemel for the Drow (and child) race
tktk1 for their Khajiit child mod I used as a template to make these
author: T3alrose
